fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An editorial misnamed the American writer Marilynne Robinson as Marilynne Robertson (People not profit, 8 June, page 2, Journal). • A headline – “Consumer borrowing drops to five-year low amid Brexit fears” – should have referred to a fall in consumer borrowing growth, not the overall figure (1 June, page 39). • Other recently corrected articles include: Trump wrote off novichok attack of defector as ‘spy games’ – report Dr John obituary
